LanguageData.Tobacco.stages.0.label: Grabbed a smoke (comfortably numb)
LanguageData.Tobacco.stages.0.description: I feel calm, cool, and collected.
LanguageData.Tobacco.stages.1.label: Grabbed a smoke (comfortably buzzed)
LanguageData.TobaccoWithdrawal.stages.1.label: tobacco withdrawal
LanguageData.TobaccoWithdrawal.stages.1.description: Feeling shaky. Everything pisses me off. I keep thinking of smoking.
